channel.title: Cannot connect (Only on Mac)
channel.description:
Hi,
The cache downloads fine, it gets to the login bit on my Mac and when I connect, I get an "Error connecting to the server". Only on my Mac. It works fine on my Windows PC.
The console doesn't give me an error on the client, does anyone have any ideas as to how I can come closer to solving this?

item.title: Cannot connect (Only on Mac)
item.dc:creator: @ScheisseTisch ScheisseTisch
item.description:

Hi,
